pages.text: The $(thing)Metal Press$() is an automated automated means of shaping materials. Using a high powered $(thing)Mechanical Press$(), it can use molds to change the shape of an item. To work, the press needs a $(l:patchouli:machinery/molds)Mold$(), which can be inserted by using $(item)$(k:key.use)$() on the multiblock with the mold in hand.

Note that when assembling the multiblock, the mechanical press may rotate several times before it actually assembles.$(br2)In addition, ensure that the belts are moving from the side with the $(thing)Light Engineering Block$() to the side with the $(thing)Steel Scaffolding$().
Use $(item)$(k:key.use)$() on the mechanical press with an $(thing)Engineer's Hammer$() to assemble the multiblock.
